mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pm_account (id, name, iam_id, status_id, type_id, last_login) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{iamId}, #{status, typeHandler=com.tesco.pma.dao.utils.DictionaryItemTypeHandler, javaType=com.tesco.pma.colleague.security.domain.AccountStatus}, #{type, typeHandler=com.tesco.pma.dao.utils.DictionaryItemTypeHandler, javaType=com.tesco.pma.colleague.security.domain.AccountType}, #{now})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id as id, a.name as name, a.type_id as type_id, a.status_id as status_id, a.iam_id as iam_id, a.employee_number as employee_number, a.last_login as last_login, r.id as role_id, r.code as role_code FROM pm_account a LEFT JOIN pm_account_role ar on a.id = ar.account_id LEFT JOIN pm_role r on ar.role_id = r.id WHERE iam_id = #{iamId};

SELECT a.id as id, a.name as name, a.type_id as type_id, a.status_id as status_id, a.iam_id as iam_id, a.employee_number as employee_number, a.last_login as last_login, r.id as role_id, r.code as role_code FROM pm_account a INNER JOIN colleague c ON c.iam_id = a.iam_id LEFT JOIN pm_account_role ar ON a.id = ar.account_id LEFT JOIN pm_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id WHERE c.uuid = #{colleagueUuid};
